name: Afghan Diesel
description: Afghan Diesel is a hybrid strain with an aroma similar to a grapefruit and other citrus fruit. The taste has been described as light and sweet. This strain will have a more cerebral effect rather than body. The plant is characterized as having dark green leaves with purple colored buds.
attributes_title: Euphoric, Relaxed, Uplifted, Happy, Creative, Stress, Pain, Insomnia, Depression, Nausea, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes, Paranoid, Dizzy, Anxious
